thread.title: Canada Loses Davis Cup Tie To Great Britain After Player Drills Umpire In The Face
thread.title_full: Canada Loses Davis Cup Tie To Great Britain After Player Drills Umpire In The Face

author: Timothy Burke on Screengrabber, shared by Timothy Burke to Deadspin
title: Canada Loses Davis Cup Tie To Great Britain After Player Drills Umpire In The Face
text:
Canada lost its Davis Cup tie to Great Britain 3-2 after Denis Shapovalov accidentally drilled the chair umpire in the face with a ball in reaction to losing a point. Advertisement 
The event caused Shapovalov to be defaulted and Great Britainâ€™s Kyle Edmund declared the winner in what was the deciding match in the five-match series. 
Oops!
